member.name: T:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MidiObservable
member.summary: Base class for several midi classes that provide midi mesages, like: Input device, message splitter or a dummy if no input device was found.

member.name: T:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.DefaultMidiObservable
member.summary: The default event provider used by the MidiIn node if the midi input device could not be opened.

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.MidiIntToFloat(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an Integer32 in the range 0-127 to a Float32 in the range 0-1. Also takes care of clamping

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.FloatToMidiInt(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a Float32 in the range 0-1 to an Integer32 in the range 0-127. Also takes care of clamping

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.MidiIntToFloat14(System.Int32)
member.summary: Converts an Integer32 in the range 0-16383 to a Float32 in the range 0-1. Also takes care of clamping

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.FloatToMidiInt14(System.Single)
member.summary: Converts a Float32 in the range 0-1 to an Integer32 in the range 0-16383. Also takes care of clamping

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.IsNoteOnOrOff(Sanford.Multimedia.Midi.IMidiMessage,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Checks whether the midi message is a note on of off message, on is NoteOn with velocity > 0, off is NoteOff or NoteOn with velocity = 0

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MessageUtils.NoteOff(Sanford.Multimedia.Midi.ChannelMessage)
member.summary: Returns the corresponding NoteOff message to the given NoteOn message

member.name: T:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MidiOutEventSink
member.summary: Event sink that sends midi messages to an output device

member.name: M:VL.Lib.IO.Midi.MidiOutEventSink.CustomManageObservable(System.IObservable{Sanford.Multimedia.Midi.IMidiMessage},System.IObservable{Sanford.Multimedia.Midi.IMidiMessage})
member.summary: Subscribes to the observable if not already. If the input is null of the default only the old subscription is disposed.
member.param: Default observable as seen by VL.
